analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,token.cap().sub(token.totalSupply())) (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol)

Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol#299-306) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,oSb) (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol#305)
	-token.mint(bountyP,BountyCRYPT) (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol#306)

Crowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol#311-348) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol#339-341)

Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,token.cap().sub(token.totalSupply())) (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol#311-348):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol#339-341)
	External calls sending eth:

	- IcoStatus (/unique_chucks/25/0x630e8fd9322c02bd5032a290c4e5ad9237f61167.sol#345)
